DmT_SY_BloodyMoonFirst_Text_001_b: When its red glow shines upon the land...
DmT_SY_BloodyMoonFirst_Text_002_b:
the aimless spirits of slain monsters
return to flesh.
DmT_SY_BloodyMoonFirst_Text_003_b: Just as they did in a war long past.
DmT_SY_BloodyMoonFirst_Text_004_b: The world is threatened once again.
